title: I have been waiting for a pbe account for over a year is this normal how long does it take?
body:
I have made 2 support tickets about the pbe situation over the coarse of a year and they dont help. i want to know how long people have been waiting or waited.

also if someone could hook me up with an account that would be cool.

replies.body:
I took a look at the tickets you sent in asking how to get into PBE. The support agent was able to give you more context on how we choose players for the PBE servers but to be more clear, we do not simply pick and choose who to accept in PBE. Like what was said in your ticket, players are chosen by an automated system that looks for certain things based on what we're currently testing. It makes those decisions based on things such as "Hey, we're testing out a champion rework" and will grab players who actively play the champion who was being reworked.

I hope this gives more context on how players are chosen for the PBE.
